name: skull studies - 20/02/2022
description:
drawings from life emphasise just how much eyes, heads, necks, bodies, canvases and subjects move and shift in perspective.

I catch myself (futilely) fighting that movement (and you can spot the distorted results this attempt to 'copy' produces), but it's that movement and freedom to observe the subject that creates understanding, so that it can be constructed, and later without a live model
